sentences.sContent: They outgrow their clothes so quickly.
sentences.sCn: 他们长得这么快，衣服很快就穿不下了。

sentences.sContent: Harry outgrew his cot when he was about two.
sentences.sCn: 哈里差不多两岁时就睡不下婴儿床了。

synos.tran: 过大而不适于；出生；长大成熟而不再

trans.tranCn: 过大而不适于；出生；长大成熟而不再
trans.tranOther: to grow too big for something
